'''Melody of Dreamlike Wanderings: Genshin Impact 2nd Anniversary Music Review''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.0]]. It is a part of the [[Two Year Anniversary Community Event]]s.

Event Duration: September 21, 2022 – September 27, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)

Event Rules: Watch the full "Melody of Dreamlike Wanderings" video and leave the name of your favorite track in the comments section.

Rewards: Follow the event rules to get Primogems ×40.

Go to Genshin Impact's official website to learn more >>>https://hoyo.link/80eCBCAd
